message: Let's split it 60/40.  It's a fair deal that avoids us risking losing everything.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, with me getting the larger share since I'm the one making the offer this round. Let's get this done before the money starts to dwindle!
Bob, let's be realistic. I'm losing money every round.  I'm offering you 45 which is a better deal than you'll get if this goes on much longer.
